name: AVAudioSourceNode
desc: An object that supplies audio data.

items.name: typealias AVAudioSourceNodeRenderBlock
items.desc: A block that supplies audio data to an audio source node.

items.name: init(renderBlock: AVAudioSourceNodeRenderBlock)
items.desc: Creates an audio source node with a block that supplies audio data.

items.name: init(format: AVAudioFormat, renderBlock: AVAudioSourceNodeRenderBlock)
items.desc: Creates an audio source node with the audio format and a block that supplies audio data.
